name: MidOcean Partners
overview: MidOcean Partners is a private equity firm specializing in investments in middle market companies. It typically invests in consumer and leisure, media and communications, business services, financial services, industrials, niche industrials, transportation, and healthcare sectors. Within the business services sector, the firm focuses on information services, outsourced services, environmental services, educational services, and marketing services. Within the consumer and leisure space, the firm is focused on products and services. Within the niche industrial space, the firm seeks to invest in service and logistic companies likely to benefit from a change in supply chain. The firm seeks to invest in companies based in United States and Europe. The firm seeks to invest a minimum of $25 million in equity. It prefers to make control investments. MidOcean Partners was founded in February 2003 and is based in New York, New York with two additional offices in London, United Kingdom.

funding_round.source_description: INSIGHT ANNOUNCES EQUITY INVESTMENT BY CRESTVIEW AND MIDOCEAN

milestones.description: MidOcean Partners Announces Acquisition of Global Knowledge Training
